text: Tortilla Flat is a 1942 American romantic comedy movie. Victor Fleming was the director. It was based on the 1935 novel with the same name by John Steinbeck. Spencer Tracy, Hedy Lamarr, John Garfield, Frank Morgan, Akim Tamiroff, Sheldon Leonard, John Qualen, Donald Meek, Allen Jenkins, and Connie Gilchrist acted in the movie. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer distributed the movie. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Victor Fleming
title: Tortilla Flat (movie)
